metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage post tags for categorization and filtering

steps.action: Navigate to News page and click Create Post
steps.expected: Post editor should open with title and body fields
steps.actual: Post editor opened successfully with Edit Post Details panel showing Tags section

steps.action: Fill in title and click on Tags input field, type 'technology' and press comma, then type 'news' and press comma
steps.expected: Tags should be added to the post as chips/badges
steps.actual: Tags 'technology' and 'news' were successfully added and displayed as styled tag chips with remove (x) buttons

steps.action: Click the remove (x) button on the 'news' tag
steps.expected: The 'news' tag should be removed from the post
steps.actual: The 'news' tag was successfully removed, leaving only 'technology' tag

steps.action: Type a new tag name 'brand-new-tag-2026' in the tags input and press comma
steps.expected: A new tag should be created and added to the post
steps.actual: New tag 'brand-new-tag-2026' was successfully created and displayed alongside existing 'technology' tag

steps.action: Type partial tag text 'tech' in the tags input field
steps.expected: Autocomplete dropdown should appear with matching existing tags
steps.actual: No autocomplete dropdown appeared. The input field accepted the text but did not show any tag suggestions

issues: Auto-suggest/autocomplete functionality is not implemented in the tags input field. Users must manually type the full tag name.

steps.action: Attempt to add 'technology' tag when it already exists on the post
steps.expected: System should prevent duplicate tags or show a warning
steps.actual: System displayed the duplicate tag entry with a red/magenta background indicating it's a duplicate, and the tag was not added twice to the tag list

steps.action: Navigate to the News page listing
steps.expected: Tags filter/cloud should be visible showing available tags with counts
steps.actual: Tags section visible on right sidebar showing: technology (2), news (2), innovation (1), gadgets (1), sports (1) - each tag clickable for filtering

observations: The tags input uses a jQuery-based tagsInput plugin with comma-separated entry
Tags are displayed as styled chips with count badges in the tag cloud view
Duplicate tag prevention works via visual feedback (red highlighting) rather than blocking input
Auto-suggest functionality for existing tags is not implemented - this could be a potential enhancement
The TagsFilterManager.js code shows there's an API endpoint for GetTopTags but it's used for the filter display, not for autocomplete suggestions in the input field
